item.content:encoded:
Price: $60.74
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:20:21 UTC – Details)



173-piece hand tool set for basic household repairs and everyday projects; includes 8 combination wrenches, 3/8-inch ratchet wrench, 22 hex keys, 6-inch slip-joint pliers, 6-inch long nose pliers, and more (scroll down to view complete list)
Made of durable heat-treated and chrome-plated alloy steel for long-lasting, corrosion-resistant strength
Plastic non-slip handles provide enhanced comfort and control
Blow-molded case provides secure tool storage and convenient portability
Measures 16.7 by 13.4 by 3.5 inches; backed by an Amazon Basics 1-year limited warranty

(as of Nov 30,2022 06:20:21 UTC – Details)

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:01 UTC – Details)

Product Description

World Wide Application Garden Tools Set

KOTTO 4 Pack Pruner Shears Garden Cutter Clippers, Stainless Steel Sharp Pruner Secateurs, Professional Bypass Pruning Hand Tools Scissors Kit

[High-Quality Materials] – One piece chrome plated 3Cr13 stainless steel blades for high-strength use, easy to cut branches even wide to 3/4′.
[Labor-Saving] – Slightly curved scissors are ergonomically designed, and the embedded shock-absorbing spring applies pressure to branches during trimming, will save more effort.
[Comfort Handle] – The handle part of the pruning shears made by high-purity PP+TPR plastic, especially the hand grip is very comfortable, but also has strong toughness and strength.
[Exquisite Workmanship] – The blade has been sanded so deter tarnish and rust, its all matched easy-to-use safety lock. The buckle of the bypass pruning shears would also help adjust the blades angle.
[Gardening Helper] – Looking for long-lived pruning shear, fruits shear, flower cutter? Those pruning shears could satisfy need of planting, harvesting, floral, indoor and outdoor planting, greenhouse pruning.

Package Include:
3 pruner shears and 1 scissor
1 pruner shear 1 folding saw and 1 scissor
2 pruner shears and 1 scissor
3 bonsai scissors
2 garden loppers and 1 pruner shear

Storage Case:
✓
✓
✓
✓
✓

Quality : The blades of our shears gardening tools are made of high quality stainless steel that gives good precision and makes it easy to cut through branches. The ergonomic handle design reduces stress on your wrist and fits for small or big hands to ensure maximum cutting comfort and no-slip grip.
Material : The blade of these garden hand tools has been sanded to deter tarnish and rust, it’s all matched easy-to-use safety lock. The buckle of the bypass pruning shears for gardening would also help adjust the blades angle too.
Comfort : The handle part of the garden scissors/pruning shears/gardening shears/garden clippers is made of high-purity PP+TPR plastic, making the handgrip very comfortable but also tough and strong.
Gardening Helper : These grass shears/pruning scissors/garden pruners could satisfy the need for planting, harvesting, floral, indoor and outdoor planting, and greenhouse pruning.
Customer service : If you have any questions or issues regarding our product, please do not hesitate to send the seller a message through Amazon and we will respond within 24 hours.
Add-ons: We offer a pair of free protection gloves to protect your hands when doing gardening work.






World Wide Application Garden Tools Set

KOTTO 4 Pack Pruner Shears Garden Cutter Clippers, Stainless Steel Sharp Pruner Secateurs, Professional Bypass Pruning Hand Tools Scissors Kit

  • [High-Quality Materials] – One piece chrome plated 3Cr13 stainless steel blades for high-strength use, easy to cut branches even wide to 3/4′.
  • [Labor-Saving] – Slightly curved scissors are ergonomically designed, and the embedded shock-absorbing spring applies pressure to branches during trimming, will save more effort.
  • [Comfort Handle] – The handle part of the pruning shears made by high-purity PP+TPR plastic, especially the hand grip is very comfortable, but also has strong toughness and strength.
  • [Exquisite Workmanship] – The blade has been sanded so deter tarnish and rust, its all matched easy-to-use safety lock. The buckle of the bypass pruning shears would also help adjust the blades angle.
  • [Gardening Helper] – Looking for long-lived pruning shear, fruits shear, flower cutter? Those pruning shears could satisfy need of planting, harvesting, floral, indoor and outdoor planting, greenhouse pruning.

4 Pack Garden Shears 3 Pack Garden Shears 3 Pack Garden Shears 3 Pack Garden Shears 3 Pack Garden Loppers and Shear

Price: $49.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:19:48 UTC – Details)

Product Description

DOWELL 185 Piece Household Tool Set

This tool kit is a great choice for most small repairs and DIY projects around the house and office, such as repairing, outdoor fittings, garden decoration, garage construction, car overhaul, furniture assembling, etc.

It includes most daily use hand tools：

·8” Adjustable Wrench ·8oz/0.25kg Claw Hammer

·Stainless Steel Scissors ·10ft / 3mtr Measuring Tape

·Utility Knife ·5PCS Spare Snap-off Blades

·PVC Insulation Tape ·Digital Voltage Tester Pen

·Pliers: 6” Needle-Nose Pliers, 6” Diagonal Cutting Pliers, 7” Combination Pliers, 9” Groove Joint Pliers

·Precision Screwdrivers PH0X50mm, SL3X50mm, PH00X50mm, SL2X50mm

·Magnetic Screwdrivers PH2X100mm, SL6X100mm

·T-type Screwdriver Handle

·12PCS Sockets Set：4, 4.5, 5, 5.5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13mm

·40PCS Screwdriver Bits：(Slotted 4, 5, 6mm, PH0, PH1, PH2, PH3, T10, T15, T20, T25, T27, T30, H3, H4, H5, H6, H7, H8, ADP) X 2

·9PCS Hex Key Set： 1/16, 5/64, 3/32, 1/8, 5/32, 3/16, 7/32, 5/16, 3/8inch

·100PCS Assorted Screws Kit

·Plastic Storage Case

HIGH QUALITY & STANDARDS: Forged from high-quality steel and finished in high-polish chrome, durable, anti-corrosive. Handles are made of TPR material, comfortable for grip, anti-fatigue. All the tools meet or exceed ANSI critical standards.
COMPLETE VARIETIES: A combination of a variety of basic tools, screwdrivers set, bits set, sockets set, pliers set, adjustable wrench, hammer, scissors, measuring tape, hex key set, utility knife, assorted screws kit, insulation tape, voltage tester pen. Limited tools with unlimited functionality.
MULTIFUNCTION: This household tool kit contains tools for small repairs and basic DIY projects like picture hanging, furniture assembling, lighting, screw tightening, woodwork, around the house, office, garage, workshop.
WIDELY USED: It is perfect for homeowners, handymen, construction workers, mechanics. Tool set for men women college students kids, great gift idea.
EASY TO CARRY & STORAGE:This tool kit comes with a sturdy blow-molded case for easy storage and portability. Sturdy interior and organizers of this tool box keep tools in place. Put the side with ”DOWELL” up when opening the toolbox to prevent the tools falling out from the box.


DOWELL 185 Piece Household Tool Set

This tool kit is a great choice for most small repairs and DIY projects around the house and office, such as repairing, outdoor fittings, garden decoration, garage construction, car overhaul, furniture assembling, etc.

It includes most daily use hand tools：

·8” Adjustable Wrench ·8oz/0.25kg Claw Hammer

·Stainless Steel Scissors ·10ft / 3mtr Measuring Tape

·Utility Knife ·5PCS Spare Snap-off Blades

·PVC Insulation Tape ·Digital Voltage Tester Pen

·Pliers: 6” Needle-Nose Pliers, 6” Diagonal Cutting Pliers, 7” Combination Pliers, 9” Groove Joint Pliers

·Precision Screwdrivers PH0X50mm, SL3X50mm, PH00X50mm, SL2X50mm

·Magnetic Screwdrivers PH2X100mm, SL6X100mm

·T-type Screwdriver Handle

·12PCS Sockets Set：4, 4.5, 5, 5.5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13mm

·40PCS Screwdriver Bits：(Slotted 4, 5, 6mm, PH0, PH1, PH2, PH3, T10, T15, T20, T25, T27, T30, H3, H4, H5, H6, H7, H8, ADP) X 2

·9PCS Hex Key Set： 1/16, 5/64, 3/32, 1/8, 5/32, 3/16, 7/32, 5/16, 3/8inch

·100PCS Assorted Screws Kit

·Plastic Storage Case





4.5
Price: $49.99

item.content:encoded:
Price: $8.79
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:18:25 UTC – Details)



Inflation gauge: The heavy duty pressure gauge measures psi to make sure you are inflating to the perfect pressure
Needles included: Includes 3 needles for pumping up all sizes of soccer balls, footballs, basketballs, playground balls and other inflatables. This pump is not recommended as a bicycle tire pump
Emergency ball maintenance: Keep this ball maintenance kit in your bag so the game never goes flat; Ensure that the proper air pressure meets your game day requirements. Comes with a convenient carry case to bring with you wherever you go
Easy to use: Pump up deflated sports balls quickly and easily, so you or your players can get back into the game. Don’t let a deflated ball ruin your play. Perfect for gyms, schools, sports centers, camps, and more

Product Description

WGGE WG-015 Professional crimping tool/Multi-Tool Wire Stripper and Cutter (Multi-Function Hand Tool)

This 8” Multi-Functional Wire Stripper is a redesigned and completely updated version from WGGE that performs even better in wiring projects.

W&G Global Electronics Inc.is dedicated to being the premium provider with the highest quality product with reliability, long service life, and exceptional performance. As the same time, we are a manufacturer too.

One-Handed Completion

Unlike conventional wire stripper, high carbon alloy steel lift-time with such accurate stripping. Unlike conventional wire stripper, high carbon alloy steel lift-time with such accurate stripping. As an all in 1 multi-purpose tool, it can also loop wires, cut screws, crimp both insulated and uninsulated terminals.

Strips wire and loops 10-22 AWG Solid copper wire or aluminum cables Strong-gripping serrated nose for easy bending, shaping, and pulling of wire Cutting action combined with ergonomic curved handle ALL-IN-ONE, it’s could be applied to crimping both insulated and non-insulated terminals

Item features

Gauge size

Cuts, strips and loops 10-22AWG Solid copper wire or aluminum cables(0.6MM-2.0MM)

Precise bladed

High carbon alloy steel with precise bladed holes for specific gauges of wire.

Anti-slip technology

Handle is made of PP+TPR material, comfortable hand feeling, ergonomically design and optimal force-transmission.

Tips for stripping

Match the size of wire to the correct notch in the stripper

Wire Stripping Size
10-22 AWG 10-24 AWG 10-20 AWG

Designed Grip Handle

✓

✓

Adjustable

High Carbon Steel Material

✓

✓

8 inch 12 inch 7 inch

Easy To Use: Strong-gripping serrated nose for easy bending, shaping, and pulling of wire

24 Month Warranty: Quality assurance. 24 Month warranty and 24/7 hours WGGE customer service

From the brand

GARTOL Gardening Tools

Not sure how to get your GARTOL product to work correctly?

Contact our friendly support team for quick solutions.

The GARTOL is a 20 years old and professional brand in the United States. Our products are famous for high quality. We are specialized in manufacturing a wide range of garden tools comprising lopper, hedge shears, grass shears, hand pruners, hand saw, cultivator, rake, flower stand, and so on. All the products are sold to many countries and areas, including Europe, the USA, Australia, and East-south Asia.

Please let us know if you are interested.

GARTOL Miter Shears

GARTOL Garden Lopper

Garden Hose Holder

Garden Tool

Pump Sprayer,Plant Caddy

Ladies Sexy Stockings

Pump sprayer, Pruning shears

GARTOL Tools

ANTIRUST SK 5 STEEL BLADE Sharp sturdy blade, ideal for cutting chamfer, round molds, trunking and pvc strips, rubber gaskets, molding and weatherstrip.
HIGH-PRECISION ENGRAVING SCALE Clear and precise scale surface to help you cut accurately. Adjustable slider on the scale surface allows for a 45°-135°cutting angle, free to cut the trunking to different shape when needed.
ERGONOMICALLY DESIGNED HANDLE Strong and durable integrated handle is made of aluminum alloy and PPC anti-skid cover. Comfortable grip no hand fatigue for long-term use.
TURN CLASP SAFETY LOCK The turn clasp closure is easy to close and open, safe and convenient, you no need to worry about being accidentally scratched by the blade.
REPLACEABLE BLADE This trunking scissors set includes additional Spare Sharp heavy duty replaceable blade. Notice this shear is not suitable for cutting metal and stainless steel.

Have you ever had problems measuring your material only to realize it is slightly off and have to redo the entire thing?

If you’ve ever installed small moldings, such as quarter round, you’ll immediately recognize the utility of these miter shears.

GARTOL miter shears are perfect for all your installation needs to save you TIME. Use for cutting time trim, PVC piping, quarter round, tack strip, and other light materials.

Toggle to adjust the angle you want

The basic shear has a jaw with right and left 45° fences, and incised markings for 60°, 75°, 90°, 105°, 120°and 135°. Free to cut the trunking to a different shape when needed.

Don’t waste time measuring and cutting when you can do both at the same time with our Miter Cutters.

Read more

Multi-function angle shears great for cutting chamfer, shoe molding, trunking and wood parts for carpet.

Handy for odd trimming jobs, rubber plastic edge strip, PVC trunking corner, PVC edge strip, semi-circular strip, thin wooden splicing, and so on.

Snipping dowel and rods and all those other tasks too hard for scissors, yet too small for a saw. These multi-angle cutters are great for small daily work activities or even DIY projects.

Works effectively with softwoods up to 3/4″ in size.

Read more

The set includes additional spare sharp, heavy-duty replaceable blade

Our miter cutter has 2 Sk-5 steel blades, non-slip ergonomically designed handle, high-precision engraving scale, clasp safety lock.

  1. Premium stainless steel blade comes ready to take on any job, including cutting PVC, piping, wood trim, wires, or other similar materials without pulling out big materials.
  2. Whether you’re a handy person looking for a new tool or a professional with specific needs, these multi-angle cutters are great for small daily work activities or even DIY projects.
  3. Our tools come with a full steel frame and ergonomic rubber soles that provide great traction and comfort to help the hand when applying pressure on the cutter.
  4. Our pre-attached angled reference saves you a load of time and the hassle of measuring the angle trying to cut. Helps with accuracy and efficiency for your angle measuring needs

Read more

NOT SATISFIED?

If you are not completely happy please get in touch with us before leaving negative feedback. We can’t help you if you don’t let us know for assistance.

Please let us know via your Amazon order or our Amazon store. Enjoy GARTOL’s 1-year after-sales policy.

Thank you!

From the brand

Ruitool Saw

How did we get our start?

Ruitool is specialises in woodworking tools and we have a wide range of tools that will make your work more efficient and convenient.

What makes our products unique?

1.Durable & Flexible Saw Blade

2.SK5 high-carbon steel

3.Hardened 3-Edge Teeth

4.Comfortable Handle

Why do we love what we do?

Our staff have previous experience in woodworking. We know exactly which products are really effective and easy to use. And we hope that our products will make your work easier and more enjoyable.

【Durable & Flexible Saw Blade】: The hand saw blade is made of SK5 high-carbon steel. The Japanese pull saw teeth are processed by a high-frequency hardening machine imported from Japan, and the hardness can reach HRC60-63 degrees.
【Double Edged】: One side of Japanese hand saw is 17TPI for cutting hardwood, and the other side is 14TPI for cutting softwood.
【Hardened 3-Edge Teeth】: The hand saw has three-sided grinding gear design, sharp edge, faster chip removal, and smoother cutting.
【Comfortable Handle】: Exquisite beech wood handle and slight curve design make the saw handle comfortable to hold, and the operation is more labor-saving.
【Enrich Your Woodworking Life】: Straight shank double-sided small hand saw, small and light, suitable for fine cutting and small parts production, it is the best choice for woodworking DIY.

Flexible Saw Blade

Wood saw with 1/50” ultra-thin saw blade, light weight and flexible, high toughness and wear-resistant, suitable for joinery flush cutting.

Comfortable Beech Handle

Ryoba saw non-slip durable beech wood handle, compact and beautiful. Very suitable for woodworking beginners.

Two Different TPI

Double edged design, one side tooth is 14TPI, other size is 17TPI. Can better meet different cutting needs.

Hardened 3-Edge Teeth

The three-blade serration is hardened to effectively improve the sharpness and wear resistance. The cutting speed of the saw is 3 times faster than that of an ordinary saw.

Warranty & Support

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:41:39 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Excellent Design:Simple using, effort saving, high reliability and comfortability of ergonomic design.Its design and long arm enable you to save 40% effort than normal rivet nut tool and experience a more comfortable way of work.Come with 13pc interchangeable mandrels and 200pc rivet nuts in a sturdy case, all ready for your project.

Quick Changing Mandrels

Tool-free quick-change head design make it simple to change mandrels and nose pieces quickly without the need for additional tools, smooth your project and save your time.

Strong and Durable

The rivet nut tool is made from thick carbon steel with heat treated finish which protect against corrosion and give this tool added durability and strength.

Easy To Operate

It makes riveting work so easy by just 3-4 simple steps.

Organized Storage Solution

All pieces are packed in a rugged, compact carrying case for storage and portability. Each tool fits snugly into its respective place to prevent moving around and scraping.

Provide a customized fastener solution for wide riveting applications, such as body panels, bicycle attachments, furniture and decorations, especially for off-road / Jeep modifications.

WARM TIPS:

The tool is capable of over setting small rivnut as M3,M4 and 10-24 etc. When setting small rivnut, please apply less power on the handles and the arms of the tool do not need to come very close to each other, or the small mandrel can be damaged.The mandrels are consumable. Frequent or improper use would consume the useful life of them, and even damage them. The mandrels and replacements which are universal can be easily found in Amazon.Please be noted that the M8 mandrel are already installed on the tool, so the small box of M8 is empty.

EASY TO USE- New “Toolless Quick-Change Head” design allows for easy changing of mandrels and nose pieces by hand
STRONG AND DURABLE – The 16″ rivet nut tool is made from thick carbon steel with heat treated, and black phosphating finishing protects against corrosion. U cross-section of arm is of high reliability to prevent getting bent. With designed structure and tough materiels it is sturdy and durable enough for long life performance.
VARIOUS USE-CASE SCENARIOS – It provide professional solution for all kinds of riveting cases as metal plate, plastic piece, riveting workpiece, bicycle attachments, car attachments, decorations etc.
COMPLETE ACCESSORIES & SOLID CARRYING CASE – Equipped with 13pc interchangeable mandrels(Metric M3 M4 M5 M6 M8 M10 M12; SAE 8-32,10-24,1/4-20,5/16-18,3/8-16,1/2-13) and 200pc rivet nuts (20 rivet nuts each for M3,M4,M5,M6;8-32,10-24, 1/4-20, 10 rivet nuts each for M8,M10,M12; 5/16- 18, 3/8-16,1/2-13.)Please note that the M8 mandrel was installed in the gun,so the small box of M8 is empty.All pieces are packed in a rugged, compact carrying case for storage and portability.
WARRANTY AND SERVICE – Incase you are not satisfied with this product for any reason, or you have any question please feel free to contact us, we are ready to service you any time.

Excellent Design:Simple using, effort saving, high reliability and comfortability of ergonomic design.Its design and long arm enable you to save 40% effort than normal rivet nut tool and experience a more comfortable way of work.Come with 13pc interchangeable mandrels and 200pc rivet nuts in a sturdy case, all ready for your project.

Quick Changing Mandrels

Tool-free quick-change head design make it simple to change mandrels and nose pieces quickly without the need for additional tools, smooth your project and save your time.

Strong and Durable

The rivet nut tool is made from thick carbon steel with heat treated finish which protect against corrosion and give this tool added durability and strength.

Easy To Operate

It makes riveting work so easy by just 3-4 simple steps.

Organized Storage Solution

All pieces are packed in a rugged, compact carrying case for storage and portability. Each tool fits snugly into its respective place to prevent moving around and scraping.

Read more

Provide a customized fastener solution for wide riveting applications, such as body panels, bicycle attachments, furniture and decorations, especially for off-road / Jeep modifications.

WARM TIPS:

  • The tool is capable of over setting small rivnut as M3,M4 and 10-24 etc. When setting small rivnut, please apply less power on the handles and the arms of the tool do not need to come very close to each other, or the small mandrel can be damaged.
  • The mandrels are consumable. Frequent or improper use would consume the useful life of them, and even damage them. The mandrels and replacements which are universal can be easily found in Amazon.
  • Please be noted that the M8 mandrel are already installed on the tool, so the small box of M8 is empty.
